::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Kluster/Grimmler/Slayer::

Ramulus glances at the weapons on the table once more, nodding. "Allright, 
I'll ask the Cybertronian Fire for reinforcements and equipment, then we'll 
be ready. If this breaks out into a battle, we can't be unprepared."

He taps his comm-link, sending a transmission to the Cybertronian Fire, 
requesting troops and a dozen or so cloaking devices.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster turns around to face the console as Ramulus' transmission comes in. 
He sighs, tapping his comm-link.

"Firearm, Proto," he says into it, "Your assistance is needed at the Ark, 
quickly. Bring a dozen cloaking devices with you."

"On my way," both Proto and Firearm respond, both of them running off toward 
the equipment rooms.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler nods, contacting Kluster to verify what this bot was saying.

"Hey," he says into his comm-link, "There's a bot here that says you told me 
to go with him. His name's Valtron."

"Yeah," Kluster's voice replies, "I told him to go. Report to me 
periodically, I want to know what's happening."

Grimmler looks back at Valtron. "Allright, I guess I'm going with you," he 
says, ready to follow Valtron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer recieves Prebon's orders, walking toward the bridge, his suit still on 
him.

He enters, his red optics scanning across the bots in the room, growling as 
he sees Spears. Slayer turns to Prebon, bowing slightly.

"I am ready to kill this Ramulus, Master," he says, glancing threateningly at 
Spears as he does so.
